fields.name: %player
fields.value: This part specifies who gets the message. This can also be replaced with 'everyone'

fields.name: %channel
fields.value: This part is the channel that the text uses for using the chat window.

fields.name: %message
fields.value: What to send to the player(s).

fields.name: %sound
fields.value: [Optiona Parameter] This part is the sound file (.wav) that you want to play along with the message.

fields.name: %vehicleId
fields.value: The vehicle to be ordered

fields.name: command
fields.value: the command to issue

fields.name: [bool | %obj]
fields.value: %obj to interact with, or bool for confirmation

setposition.title: setPosition(%objectId, %xPos, %yPos, %xPos[, %zRot[, %xRot]]);
setposition.description: Relocates an object to a new place, with optional facing directions

fields.name: %objectId
fields.value: The object you wish to set the position of.

fields.name: %xPos
fields.value: The X coordinate.

fields.name: %yPos
fields.value: The Y coordinate.

fields.name: %zPos
fields.value: The X coordinate.

fields.name: %zRot
fields.value: [Optiona Parameter] What direction the %objectId will end up facing.

fields.name: %xRot
fields.value: [Optiona Parameter]

healobject.title: healObject(%objectId, %amount);
healobject.description: Give (or take) health to (from) an object or vehicle

fields.name: %objectId
fields.value: The object you wish to adjust the health of.

fields.name: %amount
fields.value: Amount of health to bestow upon %objectId. Negative numbers will result in damages.

messagebox.title: messageBox(%playerId, %message);
messagebox.description: Show a message box to a player

fields.name: %playerId
fields.value: The player to send the message alert to.

fields.name: %message
fields.value: The message to display in the alert.

fields.name: %vehicleId
fields.value: The vehicle to send the ammo to.

fields.name: %amount
fields.value:
Increases ammo count by this amount, negative numbers will deplete ammo reserves.
(5 regular ammo = 1 blast cannon ammo)

setteam.title: reloadObject(%objectId, *IDSTR_TEAM_<TEAM>);
setteam.description: Changes the team of the given object.

fields.name: %objectId
fields.value: The vehicle or object we're changing the team of.

fields.name: *IDSTR_TEAM_<TEAM>
fields.value: Valid Options: *IDSTR_TEAM_YELLOW, *IDSTR_TEAM_BLUE, *IDSTR_TEAM_RED, *IDSTR_TEAM_PURPLE, *IDSTR_TEAM_NEUTRAL

blast.title: blast(%objectId, %radius, %damage);
blast.description: Creates a blast zone centered on the object given.

fields.name: %objectId
fields.value: The object at the core of the blast radius.

fields.name: %radius
fields.value: Size of the blast.

fields.name: %damage
fields.value: The amount of damage to cause with the blast.

gethudname.title: getHudName(%vehicleId);
gethudname.description: Returns the name of an object

fields.name: %vehicleId
fields.value: The object that we want to get the name of.
